entries.title: Deadly Ambush on Australian Police Leaves 6 Dead, Including 2 Police Officers
entries.description: A supplied undated combined image obtained Dec.13, 2022 shows Constable Matthew Arnold (left) and Constable Rachel McCrow who were killed in an ambush at a remote Queensland property in Australia. Police have shot dead three people at a remote property on Queensland's Darling Downs after an ambush in which two officers and a bystander were killed. (AAP Image/Supplied by Queensland Police)

entries.title: NSW Labor Call for Power Bills Relief For Families
entries.description: NSW Labor Leader Chris Minns speaks to the media during a press conference at NSW State Parliament, Sydney, Australia, on June 4, 2021. (AAP Image/Dean Lewins)

entries.title: Ex-Sinn Fein Councillor Says Irish Gangster Asked for Dissident Republican Help to End Underworld Feud

entries.title: Peru President Proposes Moving up Elections Amid Protests

entries.title: Fire in Quebec Suburb Engulfs Apartment Building Leaving Woman in Critical Condition
entries.description: Rescue personnel search through the icy rubble of fire that destroyed a seniors' residence Friday, Jan. 24, 2014, in L'Isle-Verte, Quebec. (The Canadian Press/Ryan Remiorz)

entries.title: Not yet Over the Moon: Here’s What’s on the Horizon for Canadian Space Exploration
entries.description: This image released by NASA on Tuesday, July 12, 2022, shows the edge of a nearby, young, star-forming region NGC 3324 in the Carina Nebula. Captured in infrared light by the Near-Infrared Camera (NIRCam) on the James Webb Space Telescope, this image reveals previously obscured areas of star birth, according to NASA. (The Canadian Press/NASA, ESA, CSA, and STScI via AP)

entries.title: Who Is to Blame for Australia’s Sliding Education Standards?
entries.description: Year 12 students pose for a media opportunity following their first HSC exam at Sydney Secondary College in Sydney, Australia, on Nov. 9, 2021. (AAP Image/Mick Tsikas)

entries.title: Christmas Tree Shortage Stumps Australian Christmas Celebrations
